title: Jason: 将分享很酷的新特性
author: LeoPro
txt_content:
Jason：Sorry for being so quiet lately. But never fear, lots of cool stuff going on that I hope to be able to share soon.
Jason：抱歉，最近一直很安静。但是不要担心，有很多很酷的东西将要到来，我希望不久以后将分享它们。
